title: 2 bedroom ready now!!!
posting_body: ['Cottonwood Creek Apartments', 'Looking for a one bedroom or Two Bedroom?', 'Well, we have you covered!', 'We have several Units to choose from.', '$0 Deposit (OAC)', '$50.00 -Application fee', '$100.00 holding fee (this goes toward the move in cost)', '$200.00 Admin fee', 'We are an animal friendly complex with no breed restrictions ;)', 'Community:', '24hr emergency maintenance', 'On-site Community staff', 'Sparkling Pool', 'Laundry Facility on-site', 'Minutes from shopping', 'Walking distance from schools and hospitals', 'On a direct RTC bus line', 'Apartment features:', '1x1 - 740 square feet', '2x1 - 840 square feet', 'Galley style kitchen with dining room', 'Large Windows', 'Refrigerator', 'Stove', 'Dishwashers', 'Water, Sewer, and Garbage comes included in the rent']
